genealogical_system.description: Royal and chiefly lineages, succession patterns

astronomical_calendar.description: Lunar cycles, celestial observations, calendar systems
evidence_sources: Mamari Tablet (Text C) - confirmed lunar calendar
PDF: Rongorongo as sacred knowledge system

genealogy_plus_astronomy.evidence: Some tablets show genealogical sequences with temporal/seasonal markers
genealogy_plus_astronomy.note: May indicate birth dates or reign periods

marine_plus_genealogy.description: Marine creatures appear in some genealogical contexts
marine_plus_genealogy.evidence: Turtle glyph (B280) appears in genealogies with 0.95 confidence

birds_plus_ritual.evidence: Frigatebird as spirit symbol, bird cult practices

hierarchy_plus_genealogy.description: Social hierarchy embedded in genealogical records
hierarchy_plus_genealogy.evidence: Consistent use of chief markers in royal lineages

confidence_levels.high: Multiple tablets, consistent patterns, ethnographic support

limitations: Oral tradition gap - script is mnemonic aid

validation_criteria.ethnographic: Supported by known Rapa Nui culture
